thread.title: Best service and boutique hotel close to Tour Eiffel! <3
thread.title_full: Best service and boutique hotel close to Tour Eiffel! <3 - Review of Hotel Le Marquis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: N184AWdiana
title: Best service and boutique hotel close to Tour Eiffel! <3
text:
We loved this cute hotel, it is clean, beautiful, close to everything and they have very loving personnel who speak several languages. We arrived in the early morning and the first thing they did when we were checking in was offer us a cafe au lait, that was super sweet of them! Robert, the concierge was very helpful, fun, and taught us how to go everywhere. We also loved Moni at the restaurant, even though we arrived late for breakfast he still served it to us and was very pleasant. We sure will be back <3
Room Tip: be careful if you reserve with expedia, they miss advertise the breakfast and it ends up costing $18... See more room tips
